title: Simple Ways to Get Dragon Breath in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Make sure you have 1,500 fragments.
steps.content: Make sure you have 1,500 fragments. Without 1,500 fragments, you can travel all the way to Sabi, but the NPC won't talk to you. You need 1,500 fragments to get the fighting style. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Sabi is in the Second Sea, so you will need to be at least level 700 to get Dragon Breath.
steps.content: Sabi is in the Second Sea, so you will need to be at least level 700 to get Dragon Breath. Incidentally, Fragments can only be earned in the Second and Third seas. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Find Sabi in the Kingdom of Rose.
steps.content: Find Sabi in the Kingdom of Rose. This NPC is wearing a bright orange vest and is located in the second-to-last arch on the wall (on the left side if you're looking from the Caf√©). [3] X Research source Talk to Sabi and he will offer to teach you Dragon Breath for 1,500 fragments.

steps.title: Dragon Rush/Z.
steps.content: Dragon Rush/ Z . 100 mastery. Useful for catching enemies that are running away, you dash 2 times with a pause between each dash so you can change direction. You're also surrounded in flames that cause damage to other players. [4] X Research source This move can be evaded by Flash Step.

steps.title: Dragon Flames/X.
steps.content: Dragon Flames/ X . 200 mastery. Two dragons come out of your fists to attack enemies in front of you. This attack causes damage and knocks back whatever it hits. [5] X Research source It is a predictable move, so others will be expecting it and not stand in front of you.

steps.title: Dragon Explosion/C.
steps.content: Dragon Explosion/ C . 300 mastery. This is a radius move, so the player thrusts their fists downward causing spikes to erupt all around them, which damages nearby players. [6] X Research source However, others can use Flash Step to evade this damage. [7] X Research source
